A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars only lasted 8 days in China\, world's biggest theater industry\, before it was scrubbed from the theaters. Many theaters did not even show it. So before you say I'm not being honest\, understand that this movie is considered GARBAGE by viewers the world over. The only thing that was cool was the empire killing 99% of the rebels. I enjoyed that but the story and characters are awful.
